places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL ELITE
address: FGJH+797, Rishi Rd, Shanti Nagar, Alipurduar, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text:
Rooms are properly maintained & is ok to to stay with family. Staff are well dressed & well mannered with no place to complain. Location wise it's in the centre of town on main road. Distance from alipurduar junction station is 4kms & public transport is easily available..
Would stay there again in future visits..

The worst hotel I have ever come across in terms of service. They forgot my order and I had to repeat them once after one hour, by that time one item was already finished. For every small things like toiletries, mosquito repellents etc you have to ask everytime. They don't let you have a menu card at room, but want orders for room service. Have a couple of items only for breakfast, but you have to come down and climb up for having the single item breakfast as they won't deliver in room and don't have a lift.
It was a really good experienced staying here with family.  Friendly environment, helpful and professional staffs, well maintained room and most importantly amazing foods, special thanks to Chef!
Worst food , they served rotten mutton and rotten rice. Fish fry they gave normal fish and charged 200 , avoid these hotel find a better place to stay. They are just bunch of liars

The hotel is situated on the road. Good location. The rooms are excellent. The hotel staff are also good. Beds are cozy.

The disadvantages are that there is no lift facility. Bathroom fixtures are broken and lastly no remote of AC given to customers (which is weird).

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Bangabhumi
address: Court More, GG2H+Q9X, BF Rd, Alipurduar, Paschim Jitpur, West Bengal 736122, India

reviews.text: I am updating my reviews based on Local standards. The hotel is pretty neat and clean. We stayed in the deluxe room and all amenities were functional. The staff especially the day manager, housekeeping staffs are very polite. The security guard who had the night duty was a gem.

The hotel was extremely noisy, specially on Saturday evening. The music from the hotel's roof top bar was so loud that it coud be even heard from their resturant on the 1st floor, it was quite disturbing, the whole building was vibrating with the bits of the loud music. It could be heard very clearly even from the close door room of 4th floor. Otherwise the hotel stay was good though the room rent was a little high compare to the facilities of the room. There's a good resturant inside the hotel and ther food taste was good.
Restaurant's food is good... ambience is unique i.e cave type and well decorated..... their staff Mr. Lama Tamang bhai, your service is just awesome, special thanks to you.
Food is great. Behaviour of stuffs are also good.
Rooms are neat & clean. Room service is good. Location is excellent. Individual food is costly but thali is reasonable.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Dooars Mountain
address: BF Rd, New Town, Alipurduar, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text: Room needs some improvement. Blanket was smelling funky. Condition of the washroom was not ok at all, stains all over the toilet seat, water tap was dodgy and broken. Foods are too much tossed with sauces and spices. Mineral water bottle per litre is 35 without GST!!! However room service was ok.

Hotel Rooms are too old. Matters are not at all comfortable. The rating is only for complimentary Breakfast quality which is good. The rooms are not worth its getting charged. Management must improve room quality.

It is a very sweet & peace place in BUXA TGER RESERVE. Beside thd Homestay a small river with cirstal clear water. Gtest alaways enjoy in the river, kids r also enjoy. They play Footbal, Cricket, Batminton in the bank of the River.
Various type of tribel you find here, like Sawtal, Rava, Dukpa, Nepali, Mech, Garo etc.
You can enjoy there culture, Traditional dance and there hospitality also.
From Break to Lanch you will get as you want, which is fully customise.
Hope you will fully enjoy & hope may be the best enjoyment in your hole life.
Very good hotel for lodging , foods and bar facilities available.
Very bad experience...very bad hospitality and behavior...I have to wait at reception near about 2hrs...because of room cleaning...and rooms are not up to the mark...

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Maa international
address: manojit nag, bus terminus, subhashpally, Alipurduar, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text: Hotel Mana International offers an exceptional stay with comfortable, well-appointed rooms providing a peaceful retreat. The onsite restaurant delights guests with a diverse menu of delicious dishes prepared with skill and passion. However, what truly sets this hotel apart is its outstanding staff, whose warmth and attentiveness ensure that every guest feels valued and welcomed. With a perfect blend of comfort, cuisine, and hospitality, Hotel Mana International exceeds expectations, promising a memorable experience for all who visit.

The rooms were clean, sanitized and comfortable. The staffs were amazing. They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. They were extremely accommodating and let us to check in at like 1 am in the morning. Moreover, they were kind enough to arrange dinner for us at that hour. We highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Alipurduar.

This hotel is location is great, on main road. Provides parking facility.  The rooms are excellent, clean and washrooms are with geysers. Staffs are polite and provide good service and their in-house restaurant food is fine too. Have lift facility also. We were on our road trip to Guwahati Meghalaya and stayed here on the day when we reached. We also stayed again while returning back.

This is a newly opened hotel & restaurant at Alipurduar located just beside the bus terminal on the highway. This is a one and only hotel & restaurant with a swimming pool. The restaurant is outstanding. The food served here is delicious. The staff are very caring and ready to help. The parking area is large enough.
Good service.  We reached around 12 mid night. They cared to provide us with dinner, even when their restaurant was closed. Rooms are clean. Good and secure space for parking vehicle.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shivam
address: Samuktala Road,Near M.N. bus Terminus, Jalpaiguri Dist, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text: I booked online for 1 day. The stay was very nice and was able to relax. The staff surely was awesome and helped us in all our requirements. The room was spacious and organized. Location is very nice. Lots of toto and bus available from the gate. Very good for family travel.
Nice hotel for budget conscious travelers. Parking space available for boarders. Good food. Helpful staffs. Recommended for middle class people.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at this luxurious hotel, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the elegant decor and warm welcome from the staff.

My room was spacious, beautifully furnished, and equipped with all modern amenities. The bed was incredibly comfortable, and I had a fantastic night's sleep. The bathroom was spotless and had complimentary toiletries, which was a nice touch.

The hotel's dining options were exceptional, with a fine-dining restaurant serving delicious meals made with fresh ingredients, a casual cafe with a great selection of coffee and snacks, and a rooftop bar with stunning views of the city. The staff was knowledgeable about the menu and catered to all dietary requirements.

The hotel's fitness center and spa were state-of-the-art, and the indoor pool was a great way to unwind after a long day. The staff was always on hand to assist with any requests and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.

Overall, I had an unforgettable experience at this hotel and would highly recommend it to anyone traveling for business or leisure. The exceptional service, world-class amenities, and prime location make it the perfect choice for a memorable stay.
Good for various programs like marriage reception, birthday celebration etc.
Nice clean room. Very professional staff

places_with_reviews.name: OYO 62896 Hotel Ridhi Sidhi
address: Bata More, FGHC+VV9, Station Rd, Alipurduar, Sobhaganj, West Bengal 736121, India

reviews.text:
Pathetic.
Run by unprofessional guys.
Booked their best deluxe room and was surprised to see:
1. Wardrobe full of dust and had an entire ants colony, which means that they doesn't even bother to clean rooms before checking in.
2. Geyser was not working too well
3. AC was leaking water, and went on leaking water for the entire night.
4. Forget WiFi, you will get it only in the first floor.
5. There is no lift present. Hence imagine the hassle after booking a room with elderly persons.
The location is seriously good, rooms would be more comfortable. Overall good.
Poorly managed. Rooms are very small with silly arrangement of furniture. However, the staff are cordial. Overall, my rating is average.
Rooms r pretty good, food is ok but room service takes a little longer to execute than expected. Still I'll go for this hotel if I have to stay at Alipurduar next time.

Wonderful stay.Rooms were a bit stuffy but its negotiable as compared to its price and location.Washroom and bedsheet  were clean.Ac was chilling.Food was outsourced as a result the quality of the food was not as good as the hotel itself.

reviews.text: This place is good and located at a great location in the town. But the major problem in this hotel is that there are some difficulties organising any event like marriage party! Because this place doesn't allow loud music, and the space here is not so large.
Decent hotel, however the room, bed and washroom cleanliness is not upto the mark. Best for bag packers. Also have a good verandah to see outside view.
